resources.string: Danjugan is a 43-hectare island rich in biodiversity. It has 5 lagoons, white sand beaches, bat caves, lush limestone and mangrove forests and surrounded by vast seagrass beds and fringing coral reefs.
Brgy. Bulata, Cauayan, Negros Occidental Philippines"

The Ruins is the remains of the ancestral home mansion of the family of Don Mariano Ledesma Lacson and Maria Braga Lacson. It is situated in Talisay, Negros Occidental, Philippines. The mansion was built in early 1900s and inspired by Italian architecture.

Campuestohan Highland Resort is a fantastic resort in Negros Occidental dubbed as “The Disneyland of Negros.” A resort with so many features and so many things to do mainly built for fun and relaxation especially for families and friends. They have zipline, sky bike, carousel, heroes’ hall, shoe house, giant foot-shaped swimming pool, huge playground and more. The food being served also gained a good reputation and their accommodation is really good.
Sitio campuestohan Barangay, Talisay City, 6115 Negros Occidental

Mag-Aso Falls is an enchanting waterfalls in Negros Occidental famous of its turquoise or bluish water that makes its basin very attractive that lures visitors for a swim. Aside from the falls, there is also a man-made swimming pool fed by the free-flowing spring water that makes it very refreshing.
Barangay Oringao, Kabankalan City, Negros Occidental
Php 50 for the entrance, Php 200 for Nipa Hut, Php 1000 for the room.
